Description.Text:
Property Location
When you stay at Hotel Don Juan Tossa in Tossa de Mar, you'll be near the beach and minutes from Tossa de Mar Beach and Villa Romana dels Ametllers. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Chapel of Our Lady of Socorro and Parish Church of Sant Vicenc.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 318 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Cribs/infant beds (complimentary) and rollaway/extra beds are available on request.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel Don Juan Tossa.

Business, Other Amenities
Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 10 AM
